# interiorBackgroundStyle

**Instance Property**

Specifies how the subviews should draw.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var interiorBackgroundStyle: NSView.BackgroundStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is dynamically computed based on the set of properties set for the `NSTableRowView`.

Subclassers can override this value when they draw differently based on the currently displayed properties.

This property can also be set to determine the color a subview should use. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/BackgroundStyle] for supported values.

## Display Style

- **isEmphasized**: Determines whether the row will draw with the alternate or secondary color (unless overridden).
- **isFloating**: Specifies whether the row is drawn using the floating style.
